# Earthquake Data from USGS

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
earthquakes <- read_csv("earthquakes.csv")
glimpse(earthquakes)
```

```{r}
earthquakes <- select(earthquakes, latitude, longitude) %>% 
  as.matrix() %>% 
  st_multipoint() %>%
  st_sfc(crs = "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +nodefs") %>%
  st_sf(earthquakes)
```

```{r}
tm_shape(earthquakes)+
  tm_dots("depth")
```
